Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2 2017.12 - ALAS2-2018-999: important priority package update for slf4j
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2018-8088:
	An XML deserialization vulnerability was discovered in slf4j's EventData which accepts anXML serialized string and can lead to arbitrary code execution.
1548909: 
CVE-2018-8088 slf4j: Deserialisation vulnerability in EventData constructor can allow for arbitrary code execution
